=== CHANGE LOG ===
- New story mode map with puzzles and enemies
- Fixed fast battle, animations now working properly and enemies are collapsing
- Added new intro audio scene to start the game
- Added new real state to the map, moved UI to the bottom of the screen
- Dialogs are now on top of the screen instead of the bottom
- Added a new NPC to town to upgrade equipment
- Added spells to increase defense and magic defense
- Town NPCs now unlocked through game story
- Added more story after killing certain bosses
- Added leader board after wining the game
http://gsd.servegame.com/leaderboard/leaderboard.html
- Added auto save option
- Added a button to attack closest enemy (easier for mobile)
- Added toggle for auto attack
- Added a bug where mana was not consumed when fast attack was on
- Added change log to main screen
- Added health bar to enemies
- Added new hard mode (complete the game in a set period of time)
- Adjusted boss 1 and 2 attack dmg
- Added a forfeit button so you can exit battles at any time
Thanks for playing!
